title: Engaged to the Unidentified
alternative_title: Mikakunin de Shinkoukei, 未確認で進行形
description: Yonomi Kobeni, an ordinary girl, finds out on her 16th birthday that she is betrothed to Mitsumine Hakuya, a boy the same age as her. Hakuya moves in from the countryside and starts living with her, bringing his younger sister who is still a primary school student with him. Also added is his older sister who is already living with Kobeni and is two years older.The story revolves around these four people and their identities as “couples” and “sisters-in-law”.
